mapper.insert: INSERT INTO boards(title, importance, start_date , end_date, due_date, code, project) VALUES( #{title}, 0, STR_TO_DATE(#{startDate} ,'%Y %m %d' ) , STR_TO_DATE(#{endDate} ,'%Y %m %d' ),STR_TO_DATE(#{dueDate} ,'%Y %m %d' ), #{code}, #{grade})
mapper.select: SELECT max(board_id) FROM boards where code = #{code} group by code

select DATE_FORMAT(A.oneday , '%Y/%m/%d') from ( select adddate(start_date, #{count}) oneday, code from boards where code = #{code}) A ,boards B where 1=1 and A.code = B.code and A.oneday >= start_date and A.oneday <= end_date

select DATE_FORMAT(A.oneday , '%Y/%m/%d') from ( select adddate(start_date, #{count}) oneday, board_id from boards where board_id = #{code1}) A ,boards B where 1=1 and A.board_id = B.board_id and A.oneday >= start_date and A.oneday <= end_date
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO info(board_id, phone, info_date) VALUES(#{boardId}, #{phone}, STR_TO_DATE(#{date} ,'%Y/%m/%d' ));
mapper.select: SELECT a.board_id, a.title, a.importance, DATE_FORMAT(start_date , '%Y/%m/%d') start_date,DATE_FORMAT(end_date , '%Y/%m/%d') end_date, a.code, d.code_name, project, DATE_FORMAT(due_date , '%Y/%m/%d') due_date , c.phone , c.name FROM boards a, manager b, user c , codet d where a.code = #{code} and a.board_id = b.board_id and b.phone = c.phone COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci and a.code = d.code COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comment (comment, board_id, phone) VALUES(#{newMsg}, #{boardId}, #{phone})
mapper.select: SELECT cmt.comment_id , cmt.comment , cmt.board_id , cmt.phone , usr.name FROM comment cmt inner join user usr on cmt.phone = usr.phone WHERE cmt.board_id = #{boardId} ORDER BY cmt.comment_id
